lead_paragraph: A former aide to President Johnson writes that “public disclosure of Nixon’s actions would have led to a different 1968 election outcome.”
snippet: A former aide to President Johnson writes that “public disclosure of Nixon’s actions would have led to a different 1968 election outcome.”...

headline.main: Nixon, L.B.J. and Vietnam Talks: An Insider’s View
